articles.title: WFH Now "Work From Himachal": State Top Cop As Thousands Flock To Hills
articles.description: Work From Home, which has become the new normal amid the Covid pandemic, has turned into "Work From Himachal Pradesh", said the state's Director General of Police as thousands flocked to the hill state to escape the confines of their homes and heat.
articles.content:
The tourist surge is a major cause for concern for the hill states (File)

articles.title: Minas Basin fossil discovery may help fill gaps in evolutionary record
articles.description: A tetrapod skull was discovered on Blue Beach, N.S., last week by a Dalhousie University biology instructor who was searching for fossils with her students.

articles.title: Former Halifax professor pleads not guilty to sexual assault charges
articles.description: Wayne Hankey has pleaded not guilty to previously announced sexual assault charges dating back to between 1977 and 1982.
articles.content:

articles.title: 70 permanent nursing seats coming to 2 Nova Scotia universities
articles.description: The provincial government announced Friday it will be adding 70 permanent nursing seats to two Nova Scotia universities.
articles.content:
Nova Scotia is adding 70 permanent first-year nursing seats at Cape Breton University and Dalhousie University's campus in Yarmouth.
